-- NUMBER OF STORY POINTS PER RPOJECT

CREATE VIEW dwh_reporting.TotalStoryPointsByProject AS
SELECT
    pd.ProjectName,
    SUM(jgf.StoryPoints) AS TotalStoryPoints
FROM
    dwh_core.jira_git_fact jgf
JOIN
    dwh_core.project_dimension pd ON jgf.ProjectKey = pd.ProjectKey
GROUP BY
    pd.ProjectName;
GO

-- AVERAGE REVENUE PER DEVELOPER

CREATE VIEW dwh_reporting.AverageRevenuePerDeveloper AS
SELECT
    dd.DeveloperName,
    AVG(pd.RevenueGenerated) AS AverageRevenue
FROM
    dwh_core.jira_git_fact jgf
JOIN
    dwh_core.developer_dimension dd ON jgf.DeveloperKey = dd.DeveloperKey
JOIN
    dwh_core.project_dimension pd ON jgf.ProjectKey = pd.ProjectKey
GROUP BY
    dd.DeveloperName;

GO

-- TOTAL COMMITS BY DEVELOPER

CREATE VIEW dwh_reporting.TotalCommitsByDeveloper AS
SELECT
    dd.DeveloperName,
    COUNT(jgf.JiraGitKey) AS TotalCommits
FROM
    dwh_core.jira_git_fact jgf
JOIN
    dwh_core.developer_dimension dd ON jgf.DeveloperKey = dd.DeveloperKey
GROUP BY
    dd.DeveloperName;

GO
